# deploygate_enterprise_member (Data Source)

The deploygate_enterprise_member data source is used to get informantion about existing enterprise member of deploygate.

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Example Usage

```tf
# Provider

provider "deploygate" {
  alias   = "enterprise"
  api_key = var.enterprise_api_key
  # Or export DG_API_KEY (Environment variable).
}

variable "enterprise_api_key" {
  type = string
  # Or export TF_VAR_enterprise_api_key (Environment variable).
}

# Data

data "deploygate_enterprise_member" "current" {
  provider   = deploygate.enterprise
  enterprise = "enterprise-name"
}

# Output

output "data_enterprise_member_id" {
  value = data.deploygate_enterprise_member.current.id
}

output "data_enterprise_member_members" {
  value = data.deploygate_enterprise_member.current.members
}
```

## Argument Reference

- **enterprise** (Required) `(String)` Name of the enterprise. [Check your enterprises](https://deploygate.com/enterprises)

## Attributes Reference

- **members** `(Object)` Data of the enterprise members.  (see [below for members](#members))

### members

- **icon_url** `(String)` Icon URL for user profile.

- **name** `(String)` Name of the user.

- **type** `(String)` Type of the user that is user or tester.

- **url** `(String)` Url of the user account.
